name: olivewood hat
notes:
elevate your crochet game with the olivewood hat pattern, a seamless and fitted design perfect for teens and adults. this easy-level project features a stunning brava stripe yarn from knit picks, ensuring a cozy and stylish finish. with detailed written instructions, crocheters of all skill levels can create a versatile beanie or toque in sizes s and l. embrace the joy of crafting with this unisex pattern that offers a fun and rewarding experience. step-by-step video right and left-handed video tutorials included!
  
**unique features-**
  
• seamless construction for a polished look
• perfect for wearing, gifting, and charity donations
• versatile unisex pattern suitable for adults
• easy-level project perfect for all skill levels
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• us-j, 6.0 mm hook, [**furls**](https://tidd.ly/4l6y8yy)
• 180-195 yds [**we crochet brava stripe**](https://tidd.ly/4ma1tuh) (4 - medium; 100% acrylic; 218 yds)
• [**stitch markers**](https://amzn.to/3tyhdg4)
